gurmukhi: ਡੱਡ ਡਿੱਗੇ ॥ ਭੱਭ ਭਿੱਗੇ ॥ ਸੱਸ ਸ੍ਰੋਣੰ ॥ ਤੱਤ ਤੋਣੰ ॥੫੪੫॥
transliteration: Dadd Digge|| Bhabbh Bhigge|| Sass Sronan|| Tatt Tonan||545||
translation: The warriors began to fall after being saturated with blood and th blood was flowing like water.545.

gurmukhi: ਸੱਸ ਸਾਧੈਂ ॥ ਬੱਬ ਬਾਧੈਂ ॥ ਅੱਅ ਅੰਗੰ ॥ ਜੱਜ ਜੰਗੰ ॥੫੪੬॥
transliteration: Sass Saadhain|| Babb Baakhain|| A-oo Anadg|| Jajj Janadg||546||
translation: There is lot of discipline and lot of obstruction; the limbs are being chopped in the war. 546

gurmukhi: ਕੱਕ ਕ੍ਰੋਧੰ ॥ ਜੱਜ ਜੋਧੰ ॥ ਘੱਘ ਘਾੲੇ ॥ ਧੱਧ ਧਾੲੇ ॥੫੪੭॥
transliteration: Kakk Krodhan|| Jajj Jodhan|| Ghaggh Ghaae|| Dhaddh Dhaae||547||
translation: There is lot of discipline and lot of obstruction; the limbs are being chopped in the war.547.

gurmukhi: ਹੱਹ ਹੂਰੰ ॥ ਪੱਪ ਪੂਰੰ ॥ ਗੱਗ ਗੈਣੰ ॥ ਅੱਅ ਅੈਣੰ ॥੫੪੮॥
transliteration: Habh Hooran|| Pappooran|| Gadg Gadnan|| A-a Ainan||548||
translation: The sky is becoming full of heavenly damsels.548.

gurmukhi: ਬੱਬ ਬਾਣੰ ॥ ਤੱਤ ਤਾਣੰ ॥ ਛੱਛ ਛੋਰੈਂ ॥ ਜੱਜ ਜੋਰੈਂ ॥੫੪੯॥
transliteration: Babb Baanan|| Tatt Taanan|| Chachchh Chorain|| Jajj Jorain||549||
translation: The warriors are pulling bows and discharging arrows.549.

gurmukhi: ਬੱਬ ਬਾਜੇ ॥ ਗੱਗ ਗਾਜੇ ॥ ਭੱਭ ਭੂਮੰ ॥ ਝੱਝ ਝੂਮੰ ॥੫੫੦॥
transliteration: Babb Baaje|| Gadg Gadje|| Bhabbh Bhooman|| Jhajjh Jhooman||550||
translation: The musical instruments are resounding, the warriors are thundering and are falling on the ground after swinging.550.

gurmukhi: ਚੱਲੇ ਬਾਣ ਰੁੱਕੇ ਗੈਣ ॥ ਮੱਤੇ ਸੂਰ ਰੱਤੇ ਨੈਣ ॥
transliteration: Challe Baan Roukke Gadn|| Matte Soor Ratte Nain||
translation: The sky is torn with arrows and the eyes of the warriors are getting red;

gurmukhi: ਢੱਕੇ ਢੋਲ ਢੁੱਕੀ ਢਾਲ ॥ ਛੁੱਟੈ ਬਾਨ ੳੁੱਠੈ ਜ੍ਵਾਲ ॥੫੫੧॥
transliteration: Dhakke Dhol Dhoukkidhal|| Chhodhttai Baan Outthai Jvaal||551||
translation: The knocking on the shields is being heard and the rising flames re being seen.551.

gurmukhi: ਭਿੱਗੇ ਸ੍ਰੋਣ ਡਿੱਗੇ ਸੂਰ ॥ ਝੁੱਮੇ ਭੂਮ ਘੁੱਮੀ ਹੂਰ ॥
transliteration: Bhigge Sron Digge Soor|| Jhoumme Bhoom Ghoummihoor||
translation: The warriors saturated with blood, are falling down on the earth and the heavenly damsels are roaming;

gurmukhi: ਬੱਜੇ ਸੰਖ ਸੱਦੰ ਗੱਦ ॥ ਤਾਲੰ ਸੰਖ ਭੇਰੀ ਨੱਦ ॥੫੫੨॥
transliteration: Bajje Sankhh Saddan Gadd|| Taalan Sankh Bherinadd||552||
translation: The sky is filled with the sounds of conches, other tunes and drums.552.

gurmukhi: ਤੁੱਟੇ ਤ੍ਰਣ ਫੁੱਟੇ ਅੰਗ ॥ ਜੁੱਝੇ ਵੀਰ ਰੁੱਝੇ ਜੰਗ ॥
transliteration: Toutte Traan Phoutte An|| Jujjhe Veer Rujjhe Jan||
translation: The armours of the warriors have been torn and they are fighting in the war;

gurmukhi: ਮੱਚੇ ਸੂਰ ਨੱਚੀ ਹੂਰ ॥ ਮੱਤੀ ਧੁਮ ਭੂਮੀ ਪੂਰ ॥੫੫੩॥
translation: The brave fighters are confronting one another and the heavenly damsels are dancing; there is talk of war on the earth.553.

gurmukhi: ੳੁੱਠੇ ਅੱਧ ਬੱਧ ਕਮੱਧ ॥ ਪੱਖਰ ਰਾਗ ਖੋਲ ਸਨੱਧ ॥
transliteration: Outthe Addh Baddh Kamaddh|| Pakhar Raag Dhol Sanaddh||
translation: The headless trunks arose in the war and were opening their gauzy armour;
